Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1986...
Injured on 7/19/1986 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Earned first career win on 8/19/1989...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/16/1991 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 9/25/1992 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1993, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
